about_the_game:
In Putty Putter, the objective is simple, get the ball in the hole. To achieve that, you control a putty-like creature that can expand and use its surroundings to form different shapes required to solve the various challenging golf putting green themed puzzles.



Features:
  • Grid based movement
  • Unique mechanic of being able to expand in 4 directions to form specific shapes required to solve the puzzles
  • New mechanics introduced throughout the game, such as spikes that are hazardous to the player, unique blocks that can only be pushed when you are a certain size and blocks that remove chunks off the player to form new shapes
  • Different themed courses with non-linear paths through the levels
  • Unlimited undo allows you to experiment with different solutions without needing to restart the level from scratch if mistakes are made
